name: Fantasy Realms
description: Epic battles in magical worlds with dragons, wizards, and ancient artifacts

cards.title: Dragon Unbound
cards.description: Ancient dragon breaks its chains and takes flight over a burning citadel
cards.imageDescription: Ancient red dragon breaking chains above a burning citadel, smoke and fire, dramatic sky
cards.effect: On summon: deal 3 damage to all enemy champions; When attacking: +2 damage if MP >= 5

cards.title: Counter Maneuver
cards.description: Anticipate and negate an opponent's move
cards.imageDescription: Shield shattering an incoming sword strike, sparks flying
cards.effect: Negate the next action, +1 MP regeneration this turn

cards.title: Fireball
cards.description: Hurl a ball of fire at your enemies
cards.imageDescription: Wizard casting a glowing fireball with intense flames
cards.flavor: The classic spell of choice for aspiring mages.

cards.title: Magical Storm
cards.description: A sudden storm disrupts the battlefield
cards.imageDescription: Dark clouds gathering with lightning bolts striking the ground
cards.effect: All champions lose 1 MP regeneration this turn
cards.flavor: Even the weather conspires against the combatants.

cards.title: Lich King
cards.imageDescription: Skeleton king in ornate armor wielding a scepter, surrounded by swirling mist
cards.effect: On summon: return 2 cards from your discard to your deck; Passive: +1 MP regeneration
cards.flavor: Death is not the end, but merely a beginning.

cards.title: Healing Light
cards.description: Restore health to yourself or an ally
cards.imageDescription: Golden light emanating from a cleric's hands, healing wounds
cards.flavor: The power of light can mend even the deepest wounds.
